Uses of Class
util.ActionResponse

  • Packages that use ActionResponse 
    Package Description
    model  
    model.contract  

    • Uses of ActionResponse in model

      Methods in model that return ActionResponse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ActionResponse Territory.killArmies(int count)
      Call this method to kill the armies in this territory
      ActionResponse Player.lostTerritory(ITerritory territory)
      called when a player lose the territory
      ActionResponse Player.moveArmies(ITerritory from, ITerritory to, int number)
      move armies from a territory to another
      ActionResponse Player.ownTerritory(ITerritory territory)
      Called if a player owns a territory
      ActionResponse Player.placeArmy(int count, ITerritory territory) 
      ActionResponse Territory.removeArmies(int count)
      Checks if there are at least one army in the territory then removes armies from the territory
